channel.title: News on VMware Cloud Knowledge

item.title: Friday, Feb 7, 2020 - Content Update
item.description: New content has been added for VMC on AWS stretched-cluster SDDCs. Updates include dedicated sections within the SDDC Network Architecture docuement as well as a dedicated content under the Compute topic.
